column1: We always make sure our booster jabs are up to date.https:/â€¦Vaccine_recommendations
Your first contact should be your GP or practice nurse who should be able to give you up to date information.

If you are travelling soon and choose to accept the Measles Vaccine be quick as you have to have a booster after 4 weeks, I had my first one 2 weeks ago, and no untoward issues. people seem wary of it and that is why measles epidemics are rearing their heads again.
I don't think it is necessary, there is currently no epidemic on the island. Most common yearly disease is the flu.
